snippet.title: Them's Fightin' Herds - Texas Release Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4735-PPSA06722_00-TFHDELUXEPS5US00

Meet Texas, a big-bodied grappler who is smashing records on size and power! Texas and the new stage "Caravan Cattledome" will be joining the roster of Them's Fightin' Herds on December 19 as part of the Season 1 Pass.

Them’s Fightin’ Herds is available now on PS5 & PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4735-PPSA06722_00-TFHDELUXEPS5US00

Them’s Fightin’ Herds is an indie 2D fighting game featuring a cast adorable animals designed by acclaimed cartoon producer Lauren Faust. Learn the ropes in an episodic story mode or battle it out online with crossplay matchmaking and rollback netcode. Beneath the cute and cuddly surface, a serious fighter awaits!

#ps5games #ps5 #ps4 #ps4games #TFH #ThemsFightinHerds
